meta.title: AI Platform for Building Regulation & Feasibility Review | BluePrint
meta.description: BluePrint is an AI-powered platform that helps you review building regulations and analyze real estate development feasibility faster and more accurately.
meta.keywords: building regulations, real estate feasibility, AI review, development analysis, permitting review, architecture platform, property development, zoning analysis, AI real estate, AI platform

hero.title: Faster & Smarter Building Regulation Review with AI
hero.description: BluePrint helps professionals in architecture, real estate, and government easily review building codes and development feasibility using AI.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Why Professionals Choose BluePrint
testimonials.description: Speeding up regulation review changes the way you work.
